column2: Dark Tower: The Drawing of the Three - House of Cards (2015) #4
column6: STEPHEN KING'S DARK FANTASY EPIC RETURNS â€" AS EDDIE DEAN COMES FACE TO FACE WITH THE GUNSLINGER! It's Eddie and Roland versus the world as the gangland war with Balazar's men reaches its bloody climax! Eddie Dean's hit a point of no return - and when his rage comes to a boil, no one is safe! What doors will be opened when there's nothing left to lose?
